material.mattext: What is the primary frequency band used by WiFi networks?

What is a significant limitation of WiFi compared to WiMAX?

What does the term "backhaul" refer to in telecommunications?
The intermediate links between the core network and the end user

Which layer of the OSI model does WiFi operate in?
What is the purpose of a WiFi router?
To connect multiple devices to the internet wirelessly
To convert digital signals to analog
Which of the following technologies is known for providing broadband wireless access?
What is a 'hotspot' in the context of WiFi?
A device used to amplify signals
A physical location where WiFi is available
A component of the WiFi router
What does 'beamforming' refer to in WiFi technology?
Directing the wireless signal towards a specific device
Which technology can provide gigabit speeds to end users?
What is the main challenge with deploying FttX technologies?
What is the main benefit of using WiFi 6 (802.11ax) over previous WiFi standards?
